title: Welcome to KenTRUCKy: State Proclamation to Celebrate Reveal of All-New Ford Super Duty
description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear designated Tuesday, Sept. 27, 2022, as KenTRUCKy Day to celebrate Ford’s 109 year-history in the commonwealth and tomorrow night’s special Churchill Downs reveal of the all-new Ford F-Series Super Duty® truck.
